name: Bulk-Select Featured Image
author: Ulf Benjaminsson

sections.description:
This plugin adds an “Use as Featured Image”-action to the Media Library. Very useful if you need to set the post thumbnail / featured image for a lot of posts.

A picture says more than a thousand words.

//Ulf Benjaminsson

sections.installation:
1. Extract the bulk-select-featured-image-folder and transfer it to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Media Library and go nuts. ðŸ™‚
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

Fix activation error.

1.1

Maybe fix for themes not supporting post-thumbnail.

1.0

Public release.

short_description: Allows you to select Featured Image / post thumbnail for your posts directly from the media library view.
